name: Essencebound
description:
EssenceBound is a mystical and magic driven tale of discovery and heroism, starring Aria, a young lady forced out of the hidden village of Essencebound by dark and evil forces.

Help Aria and the people around her by using logic, creativity and the full extent of your mind to open the way and uncover a much deeper, shocking truth behind the country's vast history and save the village of Essencebound in this original, puzzle-solving adventure.

Contributors:

Luke Quinn - Game Designer

Michael Heard - 3D Artist

Georgi Tsaklev - Programmer
